Paypal - it's a fast and secure way to pay on eBay and your
Please note that orders will be despatched to the address on
the Paypal payment page only. If paying by eCheque, please note
that these can take up to 10 working days to clear.
Bank Transfer - if you wish to pay using bank transfer,

Items are despatched every day, Monday-Friday (except Bank Holidays). If you place your order before 2PM (Mon-Fri), it will dispatched the same day. Orders placed after 2pm weekdays and on weekends are despatched the next working day. You will be notified via eBay Messages when your order has been despatched. This will include tracking reference if available for your order.

Postage charges

Postage charges depend on item weight and start from ?1.50.

Postage discount

When buying more than one item, pay a full postage charge for one item - the item with the highest P&
column2: P, and the postage for each additional item is ?0.60. Ebay will automatically combine your purchases into one invoice and calculate the postage discount for you during checkout. Please DO NOT pay for each item individually, or you will be charged full P&amp
column3:
P for each item.

Delivery times

Orders sent by Royal Mail First Class post normally take 1-3 working days. Second Class items usually take 3-5 working days.

Late Delivery/Non-Delivery

Please note that delivery times stated above are not guaranteed, and some parcels may take longer due to postal delays. We regret that we cannot be held responsible/liable for any loss caused to you by late delivery.

If the goods are not delivered within the standard delivery times, please check that your local mail delivery office is not holding your parcel for collection as calling cards are not always left.

Royal Mail allow up to 15 working days for the UK deliveries before a parcel is deemed lost in transit. A replacement or refund cannot be issued until this time has passed. In the unlikely event that your order does not arrive after 15 working days from dispatch, please contact us via eBay Messages.

The item is your responsibility until it reaches us.
Therefore for your own protection we recommend that you send
the parcel using a delivery service that insures you for the
value of the goods. Please make sure that you obtain a receipt
as proof of postage as you are liable for any loss.
If you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate
